Package org.reflections.vfs

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Vfs.Dir
    an abstract vfs dir
    Vfs.File
    an abstract vfs file
    Vfs.UrlType
    a matcher and factory for a url
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    JarInputDir  
    JarInputFile  
    JbossDir  
    JbossFile  
    SystemDir  
    SystemFile
    an implementation of Vfs.File for a directory File
    UrlTypeVFS
    UrlType to be used by Reflections library.
    Vfs
    a simple virtual file system bridge
    ZipDir
    an implementation of Vfs.Dir for ZipFile
    ZipFile
    an implementation of Vfs.File for ZipEntry
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    Vfs.DefaultUrlTypes
    default url types used by Vfs.fromURL(java.net.URL)
